lead_paragraph: Despite a strong labor market, prospects for consumer spending are not encouraging against the backdrop of the stock market sell-off.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Manufacturing and Producer Prices Decline
headline.main: U.S. Manufacturing and Producer Prices Decline

snippet: Despite a strong labor market, prospects for consumer spending are not encouraging against the backdrop of the stock market sell-off.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports that industrial production in United States fell in December, in part because of strong dollar and sluggish global demand.
